ISSUE.TITLE: Searching for a blank string creates a blank search filter
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY 1. Go to a search bar 2. Have the string be blank 3. Press enter or click the magnifying glass ##### EXPECTED RESULTS Nothing at all. ##### ACTUAL RESULTS ![Screenshot from 2020-03-31 15-51-28](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19942822/78069116-919c8080-7367-11ea-9fee-e4e0137ed92f.png) cc @jlmitch5 , this is probably up your alley.
